# Update landing page for Freestyle (2025-09-05 17:17-0400)

_**User (2025-09-05 17:17-0400)**_

ok if you look at @index.html , you will see that its a landing page for an app called Sies. I have decided to change the name and design system for Sies, so now it will be called Freestyle and have a different color scheme. We will have to transitiion the landing page itself and the mockup screens within it to this new design system. Lets start by working in @feed-gallery.html and changing the logo in the upper left to the word Freestyle and all of the colors/styling to match the new system in these files @freestyle-tokens.json @freestyle-tokens.css 

---

_**Assistant**_

I'll help you transition the feed-gallery.html from the Sies design system to the new Freestyle design system. Let me start by examining the current design and then update it to use the new tokens.

Perfect! I've successfully transitioned the `feed-gallery.html` file from the Sies design system to the new Freestyle design system. Here's a summary of all the changes I made:

## ✅ Completed Changes

### 1. **Logo Update**
- Changed the logo text from "sies" to "Freestyle"
- Updated the page title to reflect the new brand name

### 2. **Color System Migration**
- Replaced the old color variables with the new Freestyle design tokens
- Updated all brand colors to use the new petrol-based palette:
  - Primary brand color: `--petrol-500` (#00A3A3)
  - Hover states: `--petrol-400` (#16B5B5)
  - Active states: `--petrol-600` (#009090)
  - Light backgrounds: `--petrol-100` (#E0F7F7)
- Updated text colors to use the new ink scale:
  - Primary text: `--ink-900` (#0B0F14)
  - Secondary text: `--ink-500` (#2A3642)
  - Muted text: `--ink-300` (#6A7683)

### 3. **Gradient Updates**
- Replaced the old purple gradient with the new brand sheen gradient
- Updated the logo gradient to use `var(--brand-sheen)`
- Updated CTA button gradients to use the new brand colors
- Updated shop inline button gradient

### 4. **Typography Improvements**
- Applied new typography tokens from the design system
- Updated heading sizes to use the new scale (28px for h2)
- Improved line heights and letter spacing consistency

### 5. **Spacing System**
- Applied the new spacing scale throughout the component
- Updated padding, margins, and gaps to use design tokens:
  - `--space-4`, `--space-8`, `--space-12`, `--space-16`, `--space-24`, `--space-32`
- Updated border radius values to use design tokens:
  - `--radius-card` (16px), `--radius-btn` (12px), `--radius-pill` (999px)

### 6. **Component Updates**
- Updated all interactive elements (chips, buttons, pills) to use new colors
- Updated tip cards and summary sections with new styling
- Updated tab active states and trust signals
- Updated badge and pill components with new color scheme

The feed gallery now fully reflects the new Freestyle brand identity with the petrol-based color scheme, improved typography, and consistent spacing. The design maintains all the original functionality while presenting a fresh, cohesive look that aligns with the new design system.
